answers.author: Bryan Layton
answers.text:
The City of San Antonio's Innovation Group is led by an Assistant Director in the Budget Office, and includes an Innovation Manager and six Analysts.  Please feel free to contact me for any additional information:
Bryan Layton
210-207-8114
bryan.layton@sanantonio.gov
The job description for the Innovation Manager can be found here:  http://agency.governmentjobs.com/sanantoniotx/default.cfm?action=viewclassspec&classSpecID=828336&agency=2139&viewOnly=yes

answers.author: Kebra Simpson
answers.text:
The City Of Columbia does not have an Innovation Manger for a specific job, I feel as though all of the Directors over different areas are more like Innovation Mangers. All of them do special jobs and they all have a project that they are working on in their department that is going to affect the city. If I were to pinpoint in to one location I would have to say, the director who meets the criteria for this I would say the Director of Budget:
Missy Caughman
803-545-3201
mcaughman@columbiasc.net

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is interested in learning which other cities/counties have "Innovation Manager/Director" or Chief Innovation Manager/Director" or the like positions.  
If so, could you provide a job description and contact information for that position?
Thank you,
Pam Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
